name: SysML v2 Part and Item Definition Extraction
description: Extract all part definitions and item definitions from a SysML v2 model, identifying names, parent types (specializations), and attributes.
prompt:
Extract all `part def` and `item def` declarations from this SysML v2 model.

Return a JSON array where each object contains:
- "name": the definition name
- "kind": "part def" or "item def"
- "parent": the parent type if specializing (after :> or 'specializes'), or null
- "attributes": array of attribute names defined in the definition

Example output format:
```json
[
  {"name": "Vehicle", "kind": "part def", "parent": null, "attributes": ["mass", "velocity"]},
  {"name": "SalesOrder", "kind": "item def", "parent": "GeneralOrder", "attributes": []}
]
```

Include ALL part def and item def declarations, even empty ones.
